entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:31 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
